turns.ai_line: Good morning doctor, I dey feel serious pain for my belle after I chop leftover rice yesterday. My belle dey turn me, and I dey purge too. This kind wahala no dey happen before but since the weather start to dey hot reach this level, food dey spoil quick. I no fit bear this pain again, I need help abeg.
turns.user_input: No worry I'll go help you. We didn't need a job.

turns.ai_line: Doctor, na the pain I dey try talk about. E be like say something dey turn for inside my belle. I just dey feel like say I wan purge but nothing dey come out. The pain na him dey worry me pass. Wetin I fit do to stop this pain?
turns.user_input: eb full poisoning so we will prescribe you mess don't worry

turns.ai_line: Abeg, doctor, the pain dey too much. I no fit sleep. Wetin you fit recommend make I do?
turns.user_input: Just rest, lay down, drink water, take antibiotics.
